annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary repeal of section, see § 110(a) of the Omnibus Criminal Justice Reform Emergency Amendment Act of 1994 (D.C. Act 10-255, June 22, 1994, 41 DCR 4286).

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Former § 22-1515 had also been amended by D.C. Law 10-119, § 9(b).
